title: Competency-Based Curriculum for Digital and Sustainable Transition

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented education aligned with Industry 5.0 paradigm

learning_goals: Learners can design digital transformation strategies linked to sustainability goals in an Industry 5.0 environment.
Learners can plan and execute digital tool-based projects within a limited technological environment (smartphones).
Learners can propose practical applications by analyzing case studies integrating corporate sustainability goals and technological innovation.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
